name: The-flex-grid
tagline: Modern lightweight CSS grid using flexbox. Because we can!
body:
# The Flex Grid The Flex Grid is an lightweight 12 columns grid, build with CSS3 feature flexbox. The grid is made for modern browsers, no support for dinosaurs. The max-width of the grid and the with of the gutter are easily customizable by the globals in the SASS file. Vendor prefixes are added for the last 2 versions of the most used webbrowers using autoprefixer. This can be changed in gulpfile.js ## Fluid grid ```
.col-12
.col-3
.col-9
.col-4
.col-8
.col-6
.col-6
``` ## Responsive grid ```
``` ## More features View index.html for a demo of all the features like reverse order and alignment. ## Usage After cloning the repository: ``` npm install ``` Build the project: ``` gulp ``` Watch and auto refresh while editing: ``` gulp watch ```
